quote: I started doing Instagram videos, shorter form, TikTok, all the stuff that everyone else is kind of doing and I wasn't getting a lot of traction with it. And then I started from scratch thinking, what could I do that's so different, so much bigger that people would have to watch.
why_clipworthy: This moment captures the pivotal shift in strategy that led to Phil's success in video marketing.
suggested_hook: Are your social media videos not getting traction? Here's how Phil Wells changed the game.

quote: You have to be willing to do poor work that's not up to your taste standards until your skill develops to where you can match the output of the project with your taste.
why_clipworthy: This quote encourages perseverance and the understanding that skill development takes time.
suggested_hook: Struggling with perfectionism? Here's why doing 'poor work' is part of the process.
